parse: Conjunction
str2: And, even, also, namely.

parse: Preposition
str2: In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Dative Masculine Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.

parse: Noun - Dative Masculine Singular
str2: Apparently a primary word; a spot, i.e. Location; figuratively, condition, opportunity; specially, a scabbard.

parse: Adverb
str2: Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A primary verb; to stop, i.e. Restrain, quit, desist, come to an end.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Accusative Masculine Singular
str2: To pray, pray for, offer prayer. From pros and euchomai; to pray to God, i.e. Supplicate, worship.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Noun - Genitive Masculine Plural
str2: A learner, disciple, pupil. From manthano; a learner, i.e. Pupil.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.

parse: Noun - Vocative Masculine Singular
str2: Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To teach, direct, admonish. A prolonged form of a primary verb dao; to teach.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 1st Person Plural
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Verb - Present Infinitive Middle or Passive
str2: To pray, pray for, offer prayer. From pros and euchomai; to pray to God, i.e. Supplicate, worship.

parse: Conjunction
str2: And, even, also, namely.

parse: Adverb
str2: According to the manner in which, in the degree that, just as, as. From kata and hos; just as, that.

parse: Noun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Of Hebrew origin; Joannes, the name of four Israelites.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To teach, direct, admonish. A prolonged form of a primary verb dao; to teach.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Noun - Accusative Masculine Plural
str2: A learner, disciple, pupil. From manthano; a learner, i.e. Pupil.
